hadiths.text: Jabir reported that he visited Muqanna' and then said:I will not go away unless you get yourself cupped, for I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) say: It is a remedy

chapter.ara-name: باب لِكُلِّ دَاءٍ دَوَاءٌ وَاسْتِحْبَابُ التَّدَاوِي
chapter.eng-name: For Every Disease There Is A Remedy, And It Is Recommended To Treat Disease
